A timeless tale of corruption, redemption, and an evil-AI-turned-potato-battery. Filled with humor, brimming with wit, and blessed with impeccable gameplay. Truly a game to remember!

I really didn't know what to expect in the beginning.  It was my first Steam purchase.   Since it wasn't so expensive I decided to get the V I & II set together.  I ended up addicted and couldn't stop playing.  The puzzles were cleverly thought out.  I really liked the humor commentary from all the characters.  That was a great touch.  I could play it again just to listen to the humor.

Portal 1 era un 9/10. Literalmente no me imaginaba que su segunda parte fuera mejor. Pues me equivoqu√©: Este juego es un 10/10. Lo he jugado todo el tiempo con una sonrisa. Y aunque odie los juegos de puzles, ha sido un placer jugarlo. Gracias Valve por esta excelente saga.
Uno de mis juegos favoritos y por muchas razones. (joder ya saquen el 3 )
